entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 10:42 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
